description: '''Ruangsak Loychusak''' ({{langx|th|เรืองศักดิ์ ลอยชูศักดิ์}}), also known as '''James Ruangsak''', is a Thai actor and singer. His first album was ''Dai Wela...James'' ("It's time for James"). He then released ''Siren Love'', ''Forever James'', ''The Next'', ''James Hits Series'', and ''James F. M.''. His bestselling albums include ''Siren Love'' and ''James F. M.'', and popular [[Single (music)|singles]] include: "Khon raek" ({{langx|th|คนแรก}}; {{lit}}: "First One"), "Khao man kai" (ข้าวมันไก่; "[[Hainanese chicken rice]]"), and "Mai aht bplian jai" (ไม่อาจเปลี่ยนใจ; "I Shouldn't Change Your Mind").
